snippet: China will compensate a woman who was held in a disused morgue as punishment for going to Beijing to petition against her husband’s jailing, the state media said Friday.
lead_paragraph: China will compensate a woman who was held in a disused morgue as punishment for going to Beijing to petition against her husband’s jailing, the state media said Friday.

headline.main: China: Woman Detained in Morgue to Be Compensated
headline.print_headline: China: Woman Detained in Morgue to Be Compensated
